content.html:
In this lesson, you will practice solving for a specific variable to obtain an expression defined in terms of the other variables. Through the lesson’s activities you will see that this process allows you to solve problems more efficiently.

When you finish this lesson, you will be able to:

  • Solve an equation for one of the variables.

Here are the activities that will help you reach those goals:

  • 1.9.1: Rearranging an Equation in Three Variables
  • 1.9.2: Writing an Equation to Represent a Constraint
    • 1.9.2: Self Check
    • 1.9.2: Additional Resources
  • 1.9.3: Writing and Rearranging Equations in Two Variables
    • 1.9.3: Self Check
    • 1.9.3: Additional Resources
  • 1.9.4: Solving for a Specified Variable

After that, you'll practice and review.

  • 1.9.5: Practice
  • 1.9.6: Lesson Summary
